snippet.title: Mount Your Friends 3D Announcement!
snippet.description:
Wishlist Mount Your Friends 3D on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/441010/

Mount Your Friends is back in glorious 3D. Return to the sacred field to become the greatest of friend mounters in Mount Your Friends 3D: A Hardd Man is Good to Climb. Compete and climb online or get intimate with local multiplayer. Grunt and sweat it out in 16 different scenarios to challenge yourself in. Climb the goat, and become the master of friend mounting! Bring mounting to the third dimension, with the same classic innuendo that made you slightly uncomfortable back in the day.

Music
"Eighties Action"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
